videos.title: Ruby Roubaix REGISTER NOW!
videos.description:
Ruby Roubaix 2025 – Register RIGHT NOW! 
The countdown is ON for the 5th anniversary of the Ruby Roubaix Gravel Fondo, and you don’t want to miss it!
🎶 "Right Here, Right Now" 🎶 sets the tone as we gear up for an unforgettable ride through stunning Ruby Mountain views. Whether you're a competitive racer or a casual rider, this event has a spot for YOU.
Race Day: June 28, 2025
Location: Lamoille, NV
Don’t wait—secure your spot and be part of the ride that’s redefining gravel racing.
Register NOW: www.rubyroubaix.com
Ride the vibe. Ride Ruby Roubaix.
#rubyroubaix #gravelfondo #RegisterNow #righthererightnow #gravelcycling #rubyvalley #travelourgravel

videos.title: A Scenic Nevada Gravel Ride
videos.description:
Experience wide open gravel roads, dramatic canyon views, and the rugged beauty of the Ruby Mountains at Ruby Roubaix Gravel Fondo. Ride through Lamoille Canyon on quiet roads surrounded by some of the most scenic terrain in Northern Nevada.

With four distance options, Ruby Roubaix welcomes riders of all levels who are looking for a gravel ride built around space, scenery, and the joy of the ride itself.

📍 Lamoille, Nevada
📅 June 27, 2026

Register now at https://www.rubyroubaix.com/
videos.transcript:
Welcome to many gravel
ultimate cycling nestled at the base of
the majestic Ruby Mountains in the
world. Here you'll find breathtaking
scenery, challenging terrains, and a
healthy dose of small town hospitality.
Ruby Rube is a fondo style event, so you
can choose to race it or ride it. All
ages and skill levels welcome.
Experience wild, beautiful Nevada and
register today for one of our four
course routes held on the last Saturday
in June. See you out there.

videos.title: Sunny Hollow Trails in Colchester: Fellowship of the Wheel, supported by Skirack
videos.description:
With assistance from Skirack, Fellowship of the Wheel was able to secure a grant from Specialized Bikes in order to make some much needed trail repairs and re-routes in the very popular Sunny Hollow Trails in Colchester, Vermont.

Produced by: Meathead Films
http://www.meatheadfilms.com
